nodes.text: Star Wars: A New Hope: Activity Book
Star Wars: A New Hope: Activity Book is a fully illustrated activity book based on the original trilogy film Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. It was published by Egmont UK Ltd on July 4, 2015.
It was one of three activity books released, along with Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back: Activity Book and Star Wars: Return of the Jedi: Activity Book.
